<div class="documents-footer">
## About Our Documents

Our documents are created using **Quarto**, a modern scientific and technical publishing system that supports reproducible research. Each document includes:

- **Reproducible Code**: All analyses and visualizations are created with executable code
- **Version Control**: Source files are tracked in Git for transparency and collaboration
- **Multiple Formats**: Documents can be rendered to HTML, PDF, and other formats
- **Interactive Elements**: Many documents include interactive components and dynamic content

For questions about our documents or to suggest new topics, please [contact us](mailto:contact@example.com).
